alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BIG HORN...EAST CENTRAL STILLWATER...NORTHEASTERN CARBON AND SOUTHWESTERN YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Joliet to 8 miles east of Laurel to 10 miles east of Pryor to 19 miles west of Fort Smith. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Molt, Silesia, Acton, Park City, Rockvale, Comanche, and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
